table_caption: Association diffusion parameters of the SLF and memory performance.
table_foot: Data are presented as standardized regression coefficients with 95% CI.Model 1: adjusted for age, sex, level of education.Model 2: Model 1+ adjustment for the planar diffusion coefficient, reflecting the degree of fiber organization complexity.aRegression coefficient is significantly larger for CSD compared to DTI based tractography, assessed with Steiger’s Z-statistic.
